name: Down the Village
description:
Description:

Fuku was once one of the most prosperous villages of the Kingdom. But some recent events changed the situation and now the village is experimenting some strange events.

Explore the village and discover what is going on.

Controls:

W-A-S-D: Movement

Mouse: Look

E: Interaction

Shift: Sprint

Esc: Pause
